Docs.summary: Collects all errors generated by the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is created by <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> class. <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> class.
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbError> within the <xref:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbErrorCollection> collection.
